article_title: WorkSafeNB ordered 3 companies skirting COVID-19 rules to comply
article_description: WorkSafeNB says it has had to issue only a small number of orders to employers to force them to comply with COVID 19 rules
article_content: WorkSafeNB says it has had to issue only a small number of orders to employers to force them to comply with COVID 19 rules Two orders were aimed at manufacturing companies that weren t observing physical distancing guidelines and one was to a service sector   3134 chars
